title: Rustbuild: Building librustdoc fails

labels.name: T-bootstrap
labels.description: Relevant to the bootstrap subteam: Rust's build system (x.py and src/bootstrap)

body:
Building librustdoc individually fails after building rustc itself:

```sh
$ ./x.py build
.... lots of compiling
$ RUST_BACKTRACE=1 ./x.py build src/librustdoc -
executing step Step { name: "libtest-link", stage: 1, host: "x86_64-apple-darwin", target: "x86_64-apple-darwin" }
Copying stage1 test from stage1 (x86_64-apple-darwin -> x86_64-apple-darwin / x86_64-apple-darwin)
executing step Step { name: "create-sysroot", stage: 2, host: "x86_64-apple-darwin", target: "x86_64-apple-darwin" }
executing step Step { name: "startup-objects", stage: 2, host: "x86_64-apple-darwin", target: "x86_64-apple-darwin" }
executing step Step { name: "libstd-link", stage: 2, host: "x86_64-apple-darwin", target: "x86_64-apple-darwin" }
Copying stage2 std from stage1 (x86_64-apple-darwin -> x86_64-apple-darwin / x86_64-apple-darwin)
executing step Step { name: "libtest-link", stage: 2, host: "x86_64-apple-darwin", target: "x86_64-apple-darwin" }
Copying stage2 test from stage1 (x86_64-apple-darwin -> x86_64-apple-darwin / x86_64-apple-darwin)
executing step Step { name: "build-crate-rustdoc", stage: 2, host: "x86_64-apple-darwin", target: "x86_64-apple-darwin" }
Building stage2 compiler artifacts (x86_64-apple-darwin -> x86_64-apple-darwin)
running: "/Users/skade/src/rust/build/x86_64-apple-darwin/stage0/bin/cargo" "build" "-j" "8" "--target" "x86_64-apple-darwin" "-v" "--release" "--features" " jemalloc" "--manifest-path" "/Users/skade/src/rust/src/rustc/Cargo.toml"
error: process didn't exit successfully: `/Users/skade/src/rust/build/bootstrap/debug/rustc -vV` (exit code: 101)
--- stderr
thread 'main' panicked at '

failed to run "/Users/skade/src/rust/build/x86_64-apple-darwin/stage2/bin/rustc" "-vV" "--cfg" "stage2": No such file or directory (os error 2)

', src/bootstrap/bin/rustc.rs:217
stack backtrace:
   1:        0x10b28062a - std::sys::imp::backtrace::tracing::imp::write::hbb6a94eade90b732
   2:        0x10b283f7f - std::panicking::default_hook::{{closure}}::h0cb8f299c05ede1d
   3:        0x10b283c27 - std::panicking::default_hook::h34b925d635468757
   4:        0x10b284386 - std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook::hdf1ac23b3d72a5c1
   5:        0x10b2841d4 - std::panicking::begin_panic::h1322dc254aaf2333
   6:        0x10b284142 - std::panicking::begin_panic_fmt::h6d0c278aad886897
   7:        0x10b2760f6 - rustc::main::h7493d05da511d396
   8:        0x10b28524a - __rust_maybe_catch_panic
   9:        0x10b284726 - std::rt::lang_start::hcdf303e938e3ed64
  10:        0x10b276de9 - main



command did not execute successfully: "/Users/skade/src/rust/build/x86_64-apple-darwin/stage0/bin/cargo" "build" "-j" "8" "--target" "x86_64-apple-darwin" "-v" "--release" "--features" " jemalloc" "--manifest-path" "/Users/skade/src/rust/src/rustc/Cargo.toml"
expected success, got: exit code: 101
```

OS: macOS 10.11.

Used commit: a28701a928f8d6ab0299b10708441f7234ba7133.
